metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25741 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: fdctrl_write_data in hw/block/fdc.c in QEMU 5.0.0 has a NULL pointer dereference via a NULL block pointer for the current drive.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Sergej Schumilo, Cornelius Aschermann, Simon Wrner

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-09-12, the proposed patch has not been commited upstream

criterions.comment: qemu package in esm-infra/bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
